creator: ken.jonsson@gmail.com
text:
The WebDAV client doesn’t handle file names containing a plus sign properly,
e.g. “Jagadeesh+the burrito”. The plus sign becomes a space instead, i.e. it
looks like the string is not properly escaped when passed to the Slide server,
so the file created is actually “Jagadeesh the burrito”.

This is, for instance, seen when calling the method
org.apache.webdav.lib.WebdavResource.putMethod.

I think this is a problem on slide server side.
I have fixed this on the HEAD.
creator: luetzkendorf@apache.org
